# MetaMR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

MetaMR is an R package for multi-ancestry Mendelian randomization. It estimates the causal effect in a target population using exposure and outcome GWAS summary statistics from that target population, as well as exposure summary statistics from $K-1$ other auxiliary populations. 

## Installation

MetaMR uses the `mvtnorm` package as a dependency.

```
install.packages("mvtnorm")
```

To install `MetaMR` from GitHub:
```
devtools::install_github("lijackk/MetaMR")
```
